title: Lead Developer
description: Enhanced and scaled a .NET MVC-based Learning Management System (LMS), integrating new functional areas and user types while maintaining seamless operation for existing users.
Resolved long-standing issues, including the bootcamp assignment type creation bug and the index navigation issue on the student pages with video.
Contributed to resolving critical bugs within the websites and LMS.
Implement new features for a static HTML, JavaScript and CSS website.
Lead a team of 3 developers to deliver a feature within a deadline.

title: Full-stack Developer
description: Implement and enhance features in both the client-side and server-side of the software. Integrated third-party APIs, such as OpenAI, to support these features.
Refactored and upgraded portions of an existing React.js Web3 application by integrating the latest libraries and transitioning to Next.js.
Set up the software and APIs on the Linux server to facilitate live deployment.

title: Front-end Developer
description: Developed and revised website pages using Wordpress themes, plugins and some custom code
Introduce new features, resolve bugs, and address compatibility issues with the theme and plugins.

title: Junior Developer
description: Integrated products to different platforms using microservices and API.
Created test plans for the integration testing, and performed manual integration testing.

title: Python Developer
description: Develop AWS Lambda functions that can interact with AWS S3 and other Lambda functions.
Developed dynamic PDF generation that adapts to requests, ensuring proper layout without overflow

title: SOFTWARE DESIGN ENGINEER 1
description: Performed manual and automated integration testing of the software.
